properties.title: Gillingham Library
properties.description: Gillingham Library, High Street, Gillingham, Kent, ME7 1BGWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/gillinghamlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 7pm, Tuesday 10am - 7pm, Wednesday 9am - 7pm, Thursday 9am - 7pm, Friday 9am - 7pm, Saturday 9am - 5pm Facilities Photocopiers (black and white, and colour), fax, quiet study room, public access computers, playstation games for hire, listening post, plasma screen, printing and scanning facilities, lift, hearing loop, disabled access, Medway Council Contact Point, freephone for council services, public car parking just a minutes walk away.Directions A231 from Chatham to Gillingham High Street. The library is on the right.Telephone 01634 337340Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Chatham Library
properties.description: Chatham Library, Gun Wharf, Dock Road, Chatham, Kent, ME4 4TXWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/chathamlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 6pm, Tuesday 10am - 7pm, Wednesday 9am - 6pm, Thursday 9am - 7pm, Friday 9am - 6pm, Saturday 9am - 5pm Facilities Fax, photocopier, public access computers and playstation, public toilets, disabled access, listening post, refreshment area, playstation games for hire.Directions When heading up Dock Road towards Gillingham take the first left turning. The library is just by the public car park.Telephone 01634 337799Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Luton Library
properties.description: Luton Library, 2 Nelson Terrace, Luton, Chatham, Kent, ME5 7JLWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/lutonlibrary.aspxOpening hours Tuesday 2 - 5pm, Wednesday 9am - 1pm, Thursday 9am - 6pm, Friday 2 - 5pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities a photocopier; fax; free public access computers; free car park; disabled access; a small local history collection. Directions Approaching from Chatham/Rochester on A2 at Chatham Hill fork right at Luton Arches. Proceed along Luton Road to Christchurch for approximately one mile (1.61km). Turn left at village centre by Hen and Chickens pub. The library is situated immediately behind the pub.Telephone 01634 406923Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Rochester Library
properties.description: Rochester Library, Adult Education Centre, High Street, Rochester, Kent, ME1 1EWWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/rochesterlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday9am - 7pm Tuesday9am - 7pm Wednesday9am - 7pm Thursday9am - 7pm Friday9am - 7pm Saturday10am - 4pm Facilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, playstation games for hire, disabled access, easy readers collection.Directions Rochester library at Eastgate is located in the Adult Education Centre, just off the High Street and Corporation Street. There are several public car parks nearby.Telephone 01634 337411Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Twydall Library
properties.description: Twydall Library, 14-15 Twydall Green, Twydall, Gillingham, Kent, ME8 6JYWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/twydalllibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 5pm, Tuesday 9am - 5pm, Wednesday 9am - 1pm, Thursday 9am - 1pm, Friday 2-5pm, Saturday 10am - 4pmFacilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, wheelchair access, meeting room, large free shopper's car park with disabled parking next to the library.Directions Twydall is sign posted at the A2/A278 roundabout into Twydall Lane. The library is in a parade of shops at Twydall Green.Telephone 01634 232488Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Hoo Library
properties.description: Hoo Library, Church Street, Hoo St Werburgh, Rochester, Kent, ME3 9ALWeb link http://www.medway.gov.ukhttp//www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/hoolibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 6pm, Tuesday 2 - 6pm, Thursday 2 - 6pm, Friday 9am - 6pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, car parking, disabled access.Directions Approaching from Strood on the A228, follow signs for Hoo St Werburgh. Pass through the village on the main road until you reach a crossroads by the Five Bells pub. Turn into Church Street. The Hoo branch is at the end of Church Street by the Church. There is parking for approximately five to six cars.Telephone 01634 250640Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Thomas Aveling School and Community Library
properties.description: Community Library, The Thomas Aveling School, Arethusa Road, Rochester, Kent, ME1 2UWWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/thomasavelingschoolandcomm.aspxOpening hours Monday 3-6pm, Tuesday 3-6pm, Wednesday 3-6pm, Thursday 3-6pm, Friday 3-6pm, Saturday 10am-4pmFacilities Photocopier (black and white and colour).Directions The library is in Thomas Aveling School, Rochester, which is off Maidstone Road (B2097). Turn into The Tideway and then into Arethusa Road (library sign posted). Free car parking is available from the Arethusa Road entrance to the school. The library car park is located at the rear of the school buildings with immediate access to a disabled ramp.Telephone 01634 338728Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Strood Library
properties.description: Strood Library, 32 Bryant Road, Strood, Rochester, Kent, ME2 3EPWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/stroodlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am-7pm, Tuesday 10am-6pm, Wednesday 9am-6pm, Thursday 9am-6pm, Friday 9am-7pm, Saturday 9am-5pmFacilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, console games for hire, separate departments for childrenâ€™s library and reference/local studies, public toilets, car park (10 spaces), disabled access, hearing loops, exhibition and meeting facilities.Directions Strood library is situated off the A2, via Gun Lane. Turn into Bryant Road. The library is halfway up Bryant Road on the right-hand side. Street parking is usually available.Telephone 01634 335890Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Walderslade Hook Meadow Library
properties.description: Walderslade Hook Meadow Library, King George Road, Weeds Wood, Chatham, Kent, ME5 0TZWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/waldersladehookmeadowlibrar.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am-1pm, Tuesday 2-6pm, Wednesday 9am-6pm,Friday 2-6pm, Saturday 10am-4pmFacilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, car parking, disabled access.Directions When travelling to Walderslade from Chatham, the Walderslade Hook Meadow library is at the junction of Walderslade Road and King George Road opposite the Poachers Pocket pub.Telephone 01634 861531Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Rainham Library
properties.description: Rainham Library, Birling Avenue, Rainham, Gillingham, Kent, ME8 7LRWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/rainhamlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 6pm, Tuesday 9am - 7pm, Thursday 9am - 6pm, Friday 9am - 6pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, upstairs reading space, disabled access to adult lending and two display cabinets. Pay and display car parking is adjacent to library with 5 spaces designated to library users where they can park free for 45Directions Rainham library is situated in Birling Avenue (off the A2).Telephone 01634 231745 Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Hempstead Library
properties.description: Hempstead Library, Hempstead Road, Hempstead, Gillingham, Kent, ME7 3QGWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/hempsteadlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 1pm, Tuesday 2 - 6pm, Friday 2 - 6pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities Fax, public access computers, photocopier, street parking available.Directions The library is on the same site as the CP Infants School on Hempstead Road.Telephone 01634 361544Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Wigmore Library
properties.description: Wigmore Library, 208 Fairview Avenue, Wigmore, Gillingham, Kent, ME8 0PXWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/wigmorelibrary.aspxOpening hours Tuesday 9am - 6pm, Wednesday 9am - 6pm, Thursday 9am - 7pm, Friday 9am - 6pm, Saturday 10am-4pmFacilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, car parking, disabled access, out of hours meeting facilities.Directions From the A2, turn into Maidstone Road (Rainham). After approximately two miles (3.22km) turn right into Fairview Avenue; the turning is signed. There is a car park.Telephone 01634 235576Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Walderslade Village Library
properties.description: Walderslade Village Library, Walderslade Centre, Walderslade Road, Walderslade, Chatham, Kent, ME5 9LRWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/waldersladevillagelibrary.aspxOpening hours Tuesday 9am - 6pm, Wednesday 2 - 6pm, Thursday 2 - 6pm, Friday 9am - 6pm, Saturday 10am - 4pmFacilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, disabled access and exhibition area.Directions Walderslade Village library is situated in the village centre off Robin Hood Lane/Walderslade Road. The library is above the parade of shops containing Woodbury Flowers.Telephone 01634 686467Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Lordswood Library
properties.description: Lordswood Library, Kestrel Road, Lordswood, Chatham, Kent, ME5 8THWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/lordswoodlibrary.aspxOpening hours Monday 9am - 5pm, Tuesday 2 - 5pm, Thursday 9am - 5pm, Friday 9am - 5pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities Photocopier, fax, public access computers, disabled access and public car park (at rear of shops).Directions Lordswood library is located in Kestrel Road off Albermarle Road, off North Dane Way and Lordswood Lane roundabout. Telephone 01634 862096 Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Cuxton Library
properties.description: Cuxton Library, Bush Road, Cuxton, Rochester, Kent, ME2 1EYWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/cuxtonlibrary.aspxOpening hours Tuesday 9am - 1pm, Thursday 2 - 6pm, Friday 2 - 6pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities Fax, photocopier, public access computers, disabled access, limited parking although you can also park on the road nearby.Directions The library is on the drive of Cuxton Infants School. From the A228 at Cuxton by the petrol station, turn into Bush Road. The school drive is the fourth turning on the left.Telephone 01634 711391Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk

properties.title: Grain Library
properties.description: Grain Library, Chapel, Chapel Road, Isle Of Grain, Rochester, KentWeb link http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/libraries/findalibrary/grainlibrary.aspxOpening hours Tuesday 9am - 1pm, Thursday 2 - 6pm, Friday 2 - 6pm, Saturday 10am - 4pm Facilities Public access computer, DVDs for hire.Directions In Grain village, pass the fire station on your right. The computer, library and information centre is located in The Chapel, Chapel Road.Telephone 01634 338727Email chatham.library@medway.gov.uk
